snippet.title: 3D Marble Flip Full Walkthrough (Normal Difficulty)
snippet.description: Here's a very obscure ball rolling game I randomly came across recently. I found out that there was no gameplay footage online, so I decided to change that! This game is very hard and very infuriating, and it took me about 4 hours to beat the whole game (I played 40 levels before I realized it wasn't recording so I had to start over). Luckily for you I edited out all the times I failed a level, but trust me, it's way harder than it looks. If this video does well I might make a couple more videos of me beating the game in the Easy and Hard difficulties.
